<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Remove App"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/apps/{app_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Remove app, all its variant.

Arguments:
    app -- App to remove

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"app_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","title":"App Id"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
